about_the_game:
Step away from the dull routine of everyday life and open the door to a magical realm of endless possibilities and stunning beauties. In this isekai adventure, you'll dive into an exciting story and build deep relationships with captivating girls. Unravel the mysteries of this new world, master thrilling auto-chess battles, and win the hearts of rebellious Demigoddesses. The fate of this world rests in your hands — can you save it and rise as its legendary hero?

      

Immerse yourself in a whirlwind of passion with the enchanting inhabitants of this magical realm. Share the Cosmic Seed to save their world from destruction! But beware — Eternitas' grand plan isn't welcomed by all. Her daughters, the rebellious Demigoddesses, have defied her will and gone into hiding among mortals. Track them down and use your unmatched charm to convince them that the magic of the Cosmic Seed — wielded only by you — is their last hope for salvation!

      

Charm your way into the hearts of beautiful girls with your wit and charisma! Connect with them through the magical mail — a unique way of communication in this enchanting world. Exchange letters, uncover their secrets and ignite the flames of passion!

      

To save this world, you must unlock the heart of every woman you meet along the way. Only with their help can you win over the rebellious Demigoddesses. Once you fill them with the Cosmic Seed, magic will flow through this realm once more, restoring balance and ensuring its survival. There's no turning back —The Mistress of Space and Time, the mighty Eternitas, won't let you return home until your mission is complete. So, get ready to go all in. Melt the hearts of these stunning girls and become the hero this world desperately needs!

content_descriptors.notes:
All characters in the game are over 20 years old.
The game contains explicit adult themes including nudity, violence, sexual acts, depicting non conventional kinks and fictional characters depicted in sexual situations. Please be aware and ensure that you are in an appropriate location before playing to avoid causing distress to others.
